Package com.cratediggers.service

Class PaymentServices

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.service.PaymentServices
public class PaymentServices
extends java.lang.Object
Handles all business logic necessary for completing purchases via the PayPal payment gateway REST API.

      The unique client secret provided by PayPal to interact with the API
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • mode

      private java.lang.String mode
      The mode of the API. "sandbox" does not complete real-life transactions, used for testing. "live" completes real-life transactions when the site is launched.

      Parameters:

      response - object that is used to store attributes which are utilised for JSP generation.

  • Method Details

    • authorizePayment

      public void authorizePayment​(AlbumOrder order) throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Receives an order object that is used to construct a Payer object and list of Transaction objects. These are used to create a RequestPayment object with intent "authorize" and which also contains redirectURLs which are generated. A Payment is then attempted to be constructed depending on the CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_SECRET and mode fields. If there is an error authorising the payment then a ServletException is thrown. Otherwise, the payment is successfully authorised and the customer is redirected to the approvalURL to complete payment.
      Parameters:
      order - to be authorised be PayPal API
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException - if payment fails to be authorised
      java.io.IOException

    • getApprovalURL

      private java.lang.String getApprovalURL​(com.paypal.api.payments.Payment authorizedPayment)
      Performs a linear search on the Links field of the Payment object to obtain the "approval_url" which the customer needs to be redirected to.
      Parameters:
      authorizedPayment - which contains list of links
      Returns:
      The "approval_url"

    • getTransactionInformation

      private java.util.List<com.paypal.api.payments.Transaction> getTransactionInformation​(AlbumOrder order)
      Generates a Transaction object required by the PayPal API. Includes amount details, shipping address and a list of items being purchased, as specified by the AlbumOrder object.
      Parameters:
      order - to be converted to a Transaction object
      Returns:
      A Transaction object converted from an AlbumOrder object stored within a list.

    • getRecipientInformation

      private com.paypal.api.payments.ShippingAddress getRecipientInformation​(AlbumOrder order)
      Generates a ShippingAddress object required by the PayPal API. Includes information relating to the recipient and their shipping address as specified by the AlbumOrder object.
      Parameters:
      order - that contains the data necessary to generate the shippingAddress object
      Returns:
      A shippingOrder object that contains information relating to the recipient and their shipping address

    • getPayerInformation

      private com.paypal.api.payments.Payer getPayerInformation​(AlbumOrder order)
      Generates a Payer object required by the PayPal API. Includes information relating to the payer as specified by the AlbumOrder object.
      Parameters:
      order - that contains the data necessary to generate the payer object
      Returns:
      A payer object that contains information relating to the payer

    • getRedirectURLs

      private com.paypal.api.payments.RedirectUrls getRedirectURLs()
      Generates a RedirectUrls object required by the PayPal API. RedirectUrls object contains a cancelUrl for if the payment fails that ends "/view_cart" and a returnUrl for once the payment gateway is completed that ends "/review_payment". These concatenated onto the end of a baseURL that is obtained from the request object.
      Returns:
      redirectUrls object that contains URLs required by the PayPal API to return to the Crate Diggers site.

    • getAmountDetails

      private com.paypal.api.payments.Amount getAmountDetails​(AlbumOrder order)
      Generates an Amount object required by the PayPal API. Amount object contains information about price amounts such as shipping, tax and subtotals as specified by the AlbumOrder object. Also configures additional information such as currency.
      Parameters:
      order - that contains the information necessary to generate an Amount object
      Returns:
      Amount object that contains information relating to cost

    • reviewPayment

      public void reviewPayment() throws javax.servlet.ServletException
      Retrieves the paymentId and payerId from the request object. A Payment is then attempted to be found depending on the paymentId, CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_SECRET and mode fields. If there is an error acquiring the payment then a ServletException is thrown. Payment data fields are set as attributes of the request object. This is used to generate the "review_payment.jsp" page which is displayed to customers to ensure they approve the payment.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException - if there is an error in obtaining payment details from the PayPal API

    • executePayment

      public com.paypal.api.payments.Payment executePayment() throws com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException
      Retrieves the paymentId and payerId from the request object and creates a PaymentExecution object with payerID. A Payment is then attempted to be found depending on the paymentId, CLIENT_ID, CLIENT_SECRET and mode fields. If there is an error acquiring the payment then a PayPalRESTException is thrown. The payment is then executed.
      Returns:
      the payment object
      Throws:
      com.paypal.base.rest.PayPalRESTException - if there is an error in obtaining payment details from the PayPal API
